title: Sam Hoare (rugby league, born 1985)
text: Sam Hoare (born 1985), is the Australian for <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> club <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a>. Sam paid his air fare over to the UK in hope that he would get a contract with a club. After being turned away by rivals <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a>, <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a> coach <a href="Martin%20Hall%20%28rugby%20league%29">Martin Hall</a> gave Hoare a trial originally till the end of March 2007. But after two impressive appearances including two tries in his début against <a href="Newcastle%20Thunder">Gateshead Thunder</a>, Hall was quick to obtain Sam's signature, in which Sam signed a one-year deal. Sam was formerly with <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League">NSWRL</a> club <a href="Western%20Suburbs%20Magpies">Western Suburbs Magpies</a>.
